home.inboxEmptyDesc: Add items here to organize them later
home.locationsEmptyDesc: Create your first location to start organizing

settings.title: Settings
settings.exportDescription: Download a backup of all your data
settings.importDescription: Restore data from a backup file
settings.clearAllDataWarning: This action will permanently delete all data and cannot be undone.
settings.importConfirmMessage: This will merge the imported data with your existing inventory. Items with matching IDs will be updated.
settings.importTip: Tip: Export your current data first if you want a backup.
settings.clearConfirmMessage: This will permanently delete all locations, containers, and items from your inventory. This action cannot be undone.
settings.clearConfirmTip: Tip: Export your data first if you want a backup.

item.canHoldItems: This item can hold other items
item.itemCanHoldOther: Enable this for containers like boxes, shelves, drawers, bags, etc.
item.containerEmptyDesc: Add an item to get started
item.deleteConfirmMsg: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
item.deleteConfirmWithContents: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}" and all its contents ({{count}} items)? This action cannot be undone.

location.emptyDesc: Add a location or item to get started
location.subLocation: Will be created as a sub-location
location.deleteConfirmMsg: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
location.deleteConfirmWithContents: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}" and all its contents ({{locations}} locations, {{items}} items)? This action cannot be undone.

form.quantityRequired: Quantity is required and must be at least 1
form.name: Name
form.tagPlaceholder: Add tags to organize this item...
form.tagHint: Use tags to categorize and filter items (e.g., "urgent", "gift", "fragile")

search.title: Search
search.placeholder: Search by name, description, or ID...

tags.title: Manage Tags
tags.noTagsDesc: Tags will appear here as you add them to items
tags.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? It will be removed from all items.

errors.failedToCreate: Failed to create {{entity}}. Please try again.
errors.failedToUpdate: Failed to update {{entity}}. Please try again.
errors.failedToDelete: Failed to delete {{entity}}. Please try again.
errors.failedToLoad: Failed to load data. Please try again.
